title: Affordable Studio Apts Available Now at Brigham House Assisted Living
map_address: 341 Mt Auburn St near Boylston St
posting_body: ['Start enjoying the benefits of community living – live carefree, make new friends, participate in group activities.', 'Brigham House Assisted Living, an assisted living community that is financed under the federal Low Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) program, has studio apartments available for lease immediately!', '- Applicants must be at least 55 years of age to qualify.', '- Applicants must meet tenant selection criteria.', '- Applicants must income-qualify.', 'Maximum gross income limits* for a single-person household is $58,920 and for a double-person household it is $67,320.', '- Rates include utilities and rent; daily meals and/or personal care services are optional at additional cost.', "Brigham House Assisted Living offers all of the conveniences you'll want and need for assisted living including:", '• Open and sun filled floor plans', '• Heat & hot water included', '• Oversized windows', '• Private kitchenettes and bathrooms', '• Ample closet storage', '• Dining Room services with 3 meals daily', '• Wellness nurses and care staff', '• Personalized care support', '• Outdoor patio seating and gazebo picnic area', '• Professional on site management', '• 24-hour emergency response and monitoring', '• Calendar of daily programs and events', '• Newly remodeled common areas', '• Local scheduled transportation', '• Weekly Housekeeping', 'Please contact 1(617) 923-7779 or visit us at <URL> for more details about our monthly rates and about qualifying for our LIHTC program in assisted living.', 'Schedule a tour of our community at 341 Mount Auburn Street, Watertown, MA today!', 'EHO/ADA Rates subject to change.', 'Income limits based on HUD published 2022 limits.']
